features.title: Bring your style to your Housing
features.description: At level 5, you unlock the Housing feature. Customize your habitat with various themes, furniture, and decorations to create a unique environment for your Luminals and Cardinals.

features.title: Play minigames in your home
features.description: Your Cardinals can visit when they have a playful mood. You can then choose if you want to play with them some minigames!

features.title: Essence Hunt: Explore!
features.description: Send your Luminals in one of our procedurally generated hunts! Explore diverse biomes, enconter special hunt Luminals, fight enemies, and gather resources.

features.title: Hunt battles!
features.description: Engage in a turn-based battle system and earn a chance to win rare items.

features.title: Hunt Management
features.description: While your expedition is semi-idle, you can manage your hunts. Make it faster, safer, participate in events all during your hunt!

features.title: Hunt Quests
features.description: Every day is unique, select the proposed environment and luminal to earn  more rewards!

features.title: Constellation Battles
features.description: Engage in strategic turn-based battles with constellation alignment. Use zodiac powers and Cardinal abilities to defeat your opponent.

features.title: Infinite Realms (PVE)
features.description: Discover endless battle arenas across 5 Constellation Realms. Each realm offers unique challenges and environmental advantages in combat.

features.title: Achievement System
features.description: Track your progress across 300+ Discord servers. Complete challenges, unlock achievements, and earn exclusive rewards in our growing community. (yes we are new!)
